course_title: Topics in History - TOPICS IN HIST

201.comments: Student directed seminar. Bridging the Divide: The History of the Continental Analytic Split. Cross-listed with PHIL 489, 001. Course coordinators: Marcel Shelton, Vlada Asadulaeva. Email: marcelshelton50578@gmail.com, vladaasadulaeva@gmail.com

description: Small-group instruction in a seminar format on a variety of historical topics. Check with the department for course offerings. This course does not satisfy the History Majors Research Seminar (490) requirement.
